attributes.action: Concern on the violence action the violent action from Hong Kong Police against the unarmed Civilians
attributes.additional_details:
We, the democracy-loving people living in the Hong Kong and other parts of the world, urge you to press the HKSAR Government to seize its violent action to the Hong Kong protesting citizen, who is unarmed.

In the evening of 28 Sep 2014, HK police uses tear gas shell in the crowd on Connaught Road. Several unarmed protesters and reporters has been injured by the gas and military level pepper spray.

Police Officers has announced that they will open fire against the unarmed citizens in order to clear the road by mid-night. The Hong Kong Police are now working against the majority in Hong Kong.

We would like the help from the UK, US, and NATO, to deploy troops to protect Hong Kong Citizen from over use of force from HK Police and Chinese PLA.

Please help to prevent another slaughter that might happen in Hong Kong.
